get.description: Searches Users then sends a GET request to http://www.delmarlearning.com/mobile/autoLaunch/Entitlements/GetEntitlement/<product_key>/<alt_id.split(':',1)[1]>.

put.description: Sends a GET request to http://www.delmarlearning.com/mobile/autoLaunch/Entitlements/SetEntitlement/<product_key>/<alt_id.split(':',1)[1]> and updates a Users item.

get.summary: logic for making a MindTap LTI launch without an SSO login
get.description: Learning Tools Interoperability launch for MindTap without an SSO login. This should create a token using the Okta service, generate MindTapLaunchData and open (POST) /{app_id}/demo where the activity_id is hard-coded.
